long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
## Short Description
A simple and effective Pomodoro Timer to boost your productivity by Redgrasp Microlearning.

## Detailed Description
The Pomodoro Timer Chrome Extension is a powerful tool designed to enhance your productivity using the popular Pomodoro Technique. This technique involves working in focused 25-minute intervals, followed by short 5-minute breaks.

Key Features:
- 25-minute focus sessions and 5-minute breaks
- Visual and audio notifications
- Start timer with a single click
- Reset timer with a double click
- Minimal design that doesn't distract from your work

How to Use:
1. Click the extension icon to start the timer.
2. Work on your task until the timer rings.
3. Take a short break when prompted.
4. Repeat the cycle to maintain high productivity.

To reset the timer at any time, either double-click on the extension icon or right-click the extension icon and select "Reset Timer".

Boost your productivity and manage your time more effectively with the Pomodoro Timer Chrome Extension!
